technology.name: Daemonic Pact
technology.description: A pact with the Dark Gods should not be taken lightly.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Army ability: "Chaotic Torment" when attacking
Attribute: Cause Fear for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units
All Authority: +1

technology.name: Skulls for the Skull Throne
technology.description: Khorne desires skulls, so gifts His followers with the initiative to find them. Every. Single. One.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Khorne
Passive ability: "Hellblade" for Aspiring Champions and Chosen of Khorne units
Khorne Authority: +1
Slaanesh Authority: -1

technology.name: Sacrificial Altar
technology.description: Khorne savours every sacrifice, bestowing vengeful inspiration on His armies as reward.

effects.description: Khorne Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.name: Bloodied Blade
technology.description: The bounty of souls sacrificed to the Blood God help spread the venomous seeds of His corruption.

effects.description: Khorne corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Khorne corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.name: Blood for the Blood God
technology.description: The Blood God never tires of hearing the war cry screamed in His name.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Khorne
Khorne Authority: +1
Slaanesh Authority: -1

technology.name: Dark Meditation
technology.description: A free mind is one unshackled by the burdens of ignorance, and open to receiving Tzeentch's twisted blessings.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Tzeentch
Nurgle Authority: -1
Tzeentch Authority: +1

technology.name: Mystical Banner
technology.description: All sacrifices are made under the banner of Slaanesh, filling the hearts of His warriors with pride.

effects.description: Tzeentch Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.name: Enchanted Idols
technology.description: Enchanted idols sit atop the altar of sacrifice, exuding waves of pure corruption.

effects.description: Tzeentch corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Tzeentch corruption: +1 for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.name: Attuning Ritual
technology.description: Attuning with the energies of Chaos opens many doors in the mind.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Tzeentch
Ability: "Gate of Tzeentch" for Aspiring Champions units

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Pink Horrors

effects.description: Nurgle Authority: -1
Tzeentch Authority: +1

technology.name: Gorestained Robes
technology.description: Those sworn to the Lord of Murder rejoice in every drop of blood spilled.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Khorne
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Khornate factions for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.name: Bloody Summons
technology.description: Khorne sends His Bloodletters forth, answering the call of His illustrious Champion.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Bloodletters units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Flesh Hounds units

technology.name: Searing Branding Iron
technology.description: The Mark of Khorne burns the skin, a searing reminder of His rage.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Khorne
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Aspiring Champions units

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

technology.name: Erection of Ruinous Monuments
technology.description: Tributes and monuments to the Dark Powers ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment and post-battle loot bonus effects for Altar Improvement buildings
Construction time: -20% for all buildings

technology.name: Arcane Branding Iron
technology.description: Once one bears the Mark of Tzeentch, their fate is forever changed.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Tzeentch
Barrier hit points: +800 for Aspiring Champions

technology.name: Sacrificial Prophecy
technology.description: The most powerful seers of Tzeentch divine the location of every sacrifice made in His honour.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Tzeentch
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Tzeentchian factions for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.name: Pink Horrors
technology.description: The Whirling Destroyers of Tzeentch answer only to their God's most valued servants.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Flamers units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +3 for Pink Horrors units

technology.name: Slaves to Darkness
technology.description: Perhaps the threat of a collar and chain would remind these lesser beings of their place.

effects.description: Request army cost: -25%
War co-ordination target cost: -25%

technology.name: Dark Diplomacy
technology.description: All the forces of Chaos must unite, if the scourge of Order is to ever be undone.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Skaven, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Skaven, Norsca and Beastmen for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.name: Culling of the Weak
technology.description: Stragglers will not be entertained. If you can't keep the pace, you are food for the Warhounds.

effects.description: Souls gained from battles: +20%

technology.name: Warmachines
technology.description: Hellish Daemonic power always comes at great cost, but such monumental devastation is surely worth any price.

effects.description: Ward save: 15% for Chaos Warshrine units

technology.name: Engines of Mass Destruction
technology.description: Many mortal minds have shattered in the face of these terrifying arcane engines of war.

effects.description: Ammunition: +15% for Hellcannon units
Reload time reduction: +15% for Hellcannon units

technology.name: Daemon Mounts
technology.description: Daemonic steeds are driven by unnatural hunger, carrying mortals sworn to Chaos into battle in search of prey.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Gorebeast Chariots, Doom Knights and Skullcrushers
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Knights

technology.name: Charioteer
technology.description: Engineers have perfected a wicked machine of war, drawn by fearsome steeds into the very heart of battle.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Chariots and Hellstriders
Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauder Horsemen

technology.name: Scrutiny of the Dark Gods
technology.description: Let the Marauders gather under their Dark Masters' eternal gaze.

effects.description: Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauders

technology.name: A Thousand Twisted Blessings
technology.description: Such a generous gift is the thousand twisted blessings. Think of all the needle-teeth and tentacles it bestows.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Forsaken
Attribute: Cause Terror for Chaos Spawn units
Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn units

technology.name: Unchained Beasts
technology.description: A worthy Beastmaster needs no chains to direct the ferocious nature of his darling pets.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units
Passive ability: "Gorefeast" for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.name: Giant Manacles
technology.description: Such massive iron bands are a marvel to behold, lending strength to the swing of the most colossal creatures.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% for Chaos Trolls and Chaos Giant units
Missile resistance: 25% for Chaos Trolls and Chaos Giant units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.name: Herald of Doom
technology.description: With age comes almighty power, as the Dragon Ogres of nightmare evolve to even greater strength and size.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Dragon Ogres and Dragon Ogre Shaggoths units
Charge bonus: +20% for Dragon Ogres and Dragon Ogre Shaggoths units

technology.name: Inscribed Chaos Armour
technology.description: Chaos Armour, inscribed with powerful litanies of hate, will glow hot and vengeful when struck.

effects.description: Warband upgrades cost: -20% for all units
Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, Chaos Knights and Aspiring Champion units

technology.name: Rite of Ascension
technology.description: The dark rites must be performed, if the chosen are to rise among the ranks of Ruin.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chosen
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Warriors

technology.name: Infernal March
technology.description: The Chaos Gods grow impatient. Lending a sliver of majesty, they enable their followers to march faster.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5% for armies
Battle reinforcement time: -50%

technology.name: Rotten Altar
technology.description: Nurgle's presence can be felt at the altar of sacrifice, inspiring the hearts of His adoring followers.

effects.description: Nurgle Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Nurgle

technology.name: Swamp of Souls
technology.description: Corruption festers like a deadly contagion, with its price paid in a deluge of souls.

effects.description: Nurgle corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Nurgle corruption: +1 for each active Gift of Nurgle

technology.name: Rusted Branding Iron
technology.description: Nurgle's mark reeks of rot and decay, encapsulating the source of His power.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Nurgle
Enables poison attacks for Aspiring Champions

technology.name: Profane Weaponry
technology.description: The arms of a Chaos Knight are imbued with a small but not inconsequential amount of Unholy power.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Knights
Enables magical attacks for Chaos Knights units

technology.name: Sensuous Branding Iron
technology.description: The brand of Slaanesh always stings, evoking wanton pleasure from pain.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Slaanesh
Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Aspiring Champions
Attribute: Strider for Aspiring Champions

technology.name: Echo Chamber
technology.description: The screams of every sacrifice ring out for miles, their agony like music of inspiration.

effects.description: Slaanesh Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.name: Corrupted Offerings
technology.description: Souls are sent to Slaanesh alongside idols of corruption, allowing His influence to seep into the mortal plane.

effects.description: Slaanesh corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Slaanesh corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.name: Vicious Lash
technology.description: Few sounds thrill like the crack of a whip, promising both pain and pleasure.

effects.description: Melee attack: +1 per experience rank for all Hellscourge units
Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for all Hellscourge units (rank 4 and above)

technology.name: Virulent Blessings
technology.description: Madness and misery open the mind, making space for the gifts of Nurgle's blessing.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Nurgle
Passive ability: "Regeneration" for Aspiring Champions units
Nurgle Authority: +1
Tzeentch Authority: -1

technology.name: Messenger of Decay
technology.description: Every soul sent the Urfather's way is a victory celebrated by every one of His warriors.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Nurgle
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Nurglish factions for each active Gift of Nurgle

technology.name: Rampant Plaguebearers
technology.description: Nurgle sends His Plaguebearers forth, to spread their noxious maladies throughout the land.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +4 for Nurglings units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Plaguebearers units

technology.name: Maddening Gifts
technology.description: Nurgle bestows blessings in the form of rampant disease and the endless process of decay.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Nurgle
Nurgle Authority: +1
Tzeentch Authority: -1

technology.name: Vows of Excess
technology.description: Slaanesh shares in all manner of delights, for those willing to wholly give themselves over to His whims.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Slaanesh
Khorne Authority: -1
Slaanesh Authority: +1

technology.name: Herald of Sacrifice
technology.description: A herald travels far and wide, sharing word of every soul sacrificed in Slaanesh's name.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Slaanesh
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Slaaneshi factions for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.name: Summons of Slaanesh
technology.description: With the favour of Slaanesh comes command over His forces, calling the vicious Daemonettes to battle.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Daemonettes units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Seeker Chariots units

technology.name: Sensuous Gifts
technology.description: The Prince of Pleasure rewards His faithful well, offering decadent reward for their service.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Slaanesh
Passive ability: "Soul Hunters" for Aspiring Champions and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh units

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit (200)
Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit (200)

effects.description: Khorne Authority: -1
Slaanesh Authority: +1

technology.name: Gaze of the Dark Gods
technology.description: All hope to catch the attention of the Gods, gathering where they think the Ruinous Powers will be looking.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Army ability: "Forsaken Blessing" when attacking
Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units
All Authority: +1
